contents.text: Advanced English
Personalized learning is the key to achieving advanced English skills. What would you like to achieve?
Your level of English

What level of English do you think you have?

You can estimate it. We will specify it more precisely later.
You have an advanced level!
We're happy for you! However, our specialty is helping people with basic or intermediate English to improve their skills. Would you like to know more about our program?
We will solve it
We can sort out your level later.
Your goal
What level of English do you want to achieve?
Your goal
Great! Now we know what your target is. (It can still be changed later).
Your first goal

We specialize in taking people to an advanced level of English, regardless of their initial level. We will guide you step by step at each level, but we will have the long-term goal of you reaching an advanced level.
Your native language
What is your native language?
Tailored for you!
Great! The Master English program is designed for Spanish speakers.
Keep in mind
The Master English program is designed for Spanish speakers. Can you use Spanish as the study language?
Keep in mind
If you can't use Spanish as the source language, the Master English program is unfortunately not the right solution for you. Thank you for considering us!
Tailored for you!
Great! In that case you can improve your English with us.
The key is personalization

The Master English app is based on advanced personalization to facilitate effective learning. We ensure that you learn what you need to achieve your goals. We have helped over 1.2 million adults improve their English, which has allowed us to optimize the learning process.
Motivation
What is your main reason for wanting to achieve an advanced level in English?

options.description: I want a better job or salary
I need to improve my English skills to keep my current job.
I want to travel or live in an English-speaking country
I want to have conversations in English

contents.text: Motivation
What is your main reason for wanting to improve your English?

options.description: I want a better job or salary
I need to improve my English skills to keep my current job
I want to travel or live in an English-speaking country
I want to have conversations in English

contents.text: Excellent!

Having a clear reason will keep you motivated during your learning.

Master English will help you get closer to achieving your goals every day.
Study time
Please answer the following questions about your English skills to estimate how long it will take you to achieve an advanced level.
Introduce yourself
Can you introduce yourself in English?
Text messages
Can you understand short text messages in English?

options.description: Yes, but sometimes I need to use the translator

contents.text: Sign up
Can you check into a hotel while using English?

options.description: Yes, but I would have difficulties

contents.text: Make conversation
Can you ask a colleague from the US how they are doing?

options.description: Yes, I could chat a little.
Yes, but I may not understand the answer

contents.text: Weekend
Can you tell about your weekend in English?
Short emails
Can you compose a short work-related email in English?

options.description: Yes, but it would take me time

contents.text: Meeting
If a work-related meeting is held in English, do you understand what the others are talking about?

options.description: I would understand part of the meeting

contents.text: Presentation
Can you give a presentation about your work projects in English?

options.description: Yes, but I would feel uncomfortable

contents.text: Questions
And can you answer any follow-up questions about your presentation?

options.description: It depends on the difficulty of the questions
No, it would be too difficult.

contents.text: Email
Are you able to understand longer work-related emails in English?

options.description: Yes, I can use a translator

contents.text: Talking on the phone
Are you comfortable speaking English on the phone?

options.description: Yes, if the topics are easy

contents.text: Long emails
Can you write longer work-related emails in English?

options.description: Yes, but I might need help
No, it would be too difficult.

contents.text: Professional image
Do you feel that you can give a smart and professional image of yourself while speaking English?

options.description: Yes, but only in easy situations

contents.text: Meeting with clients
Can your supervisor rely on you when needing to meet a foreign customer and speak English?

options.description: Yes, you can count on me
No, it would be very difficult

contents.text: Promotion
Do you feel that your current English skills are good enough to get you a promotion or a better job?

options.description: Yes, but I still need to improve my English

contents.text: Responsibility
Do you feel that your current English skills allow you to have enough responsibilities at work?

options.description: Yes, but I could have more if I improve my English
No, my level of English prevents me from doing so.

contents.text: Living in the United States
Living abroad
Does your level of English make it difficult for you to live in the United States?
Would you feel comfortable moving to an English-speaking country?

options.description: Having a better level of English would make some situations easier.
Only if I could improve my English level first
Yes, my limitations with English make my life difficult here.

contents.text: Dialects
Are you able to understand different dialects and colloquial speech in English?

options.description: Yes, but only if the person doesn't speak too fast

contents.text: Expressions
Are you able to use idiomatic expressions in a natural way in English?

options.description: Yes, at least the most common ones

contents.text: Complex situations
Do you feel as comfortable speaking English in any situation as you would in Spanish?
Native speaker
When you speak English, do people think you are a native speaker?
Estimated study time

Thank you for your answers! We now know how long it will take you to reach an advanced level in English.

Once you practice with your program, we'll track your progress and adapt the lessons based on your personal needs.
You have an advanced level

Congratulations! Based on your answers, you already have an advanced level.

Our specialty is helping people with a basic or intermediate level to achieve an advanced level of English. Still, would you like to know more about our program?

options.description: Yes, I want to know more
I want to retake the questionnaire

contents.text: Exit
You are going to exit the program without saving your results, are you sure?
The Master English program
It is an online program created by highly qualified English teachers. It is designed for Spanish-speaking adults who need an advanced level of English.
Email
Enter your email to see how fast you could reach an advanced level in English with Master English.
*We need your email to save your results and personalize your program. Entering your email address does not commit you to anything.
Password
Create your password!
Name
And how should we call you?
Your personalized program
Based on your answers, you can reach an advanced level in English by #9_MONTHS_LATER#.
Let's continue to confirm this estimate.
Your personalized program
Based on your answers, you will achieve an advanced level by #9_MONTHS_LATER#.
Let's continue to confirm this estimate.
Your personalized program
Based on your answers, you can reach an advanced level in English by #6_MONTHS_LATER#.
Let's continue to confirm this estimate.
Halfway through

Next, let's personalize your program further.

To fine down your program schedule, we need to define your key problem areas in English. Please answer the following questions carefully.
Your previous learning
Have you been studying or practicing English before?
Your previous learning
How long has it been since you last studied English?
Your previous learning
Do you find the level suitable for you in your current studies?
Your previous learning
Do you think your studies were adapted to your level?

options.description: They could have been better adapted

contents.text: Your previous learning
And do you find the speed of progress suitable for you?

options.description: Yes, the pace is suitable for me

contents.text: Your previous learning
And do you consider that you were advancing at an adequate pace?

options.description: Yes, the pace was suitable for me
It could have been more tailored to me

contents.text: Let's focus on you

When it comes to English learning for adults, everyone has their own starting level, problem areas, and learning speed.

The Master English app uses advanced technology to personalize your learning experience according to your needs.
Let's focus on you

Let's make sure your first English learning experience will be a good one.

The thing in adult English learning is that everyone has their unique starting point, problem areas and learning speed.

Master English app uses special technology to personalise your learning experience according to your needs.
Let's focus on you

Based on your answers, you already have a study method that fits your level well. Great!

Let's try to understand if we could still find a way to improve your learning results.

Master English app uses special technology to focus your studies on your problem areas. And by doing interactive exercises we can build you skills that you can use in actual real life conversations.
Vocabulary
Do you have problems with vocabulary in English?
Vocabulary
Master English will streamline your vocabulary learning with our state-of-the-art spaced repetition model. With this method, our app adapts to your learning speed.
Form sentences
Do you have problems forming full sentences in English?
Form sentences

We will teach you to form sentences that you can then use in real-life conversations in English.

As you improve your level, we will introduce you to more complex sentences.
Listen to others
Do you struggle with understanding what others are saying in English?
Listen to others
Have you got the chance to practice your listening skills while listening to authentic real-life conversations?
Listen to others

In Master English, you will be exposed to native English models to get accustomed to their accents and speaking speeds.

Additionally, we will teach you to recognize those words and expressions that are more difficult for Spanish speakers to understand.
Pronunciation
Do you struggle with pronouncing English words?
Pronunciation
Have you received feedback on your pronunciation with detailed instructions to improve it?
Pronunciation

In the Master English app, we use speech recognition technology to detect your pronunciation mistakes and teach you how to correct them.

Additionally, you will be able to listen to yourself and compare your recordings with those of native speakers.
Conversation
Do you relate to the following: "I wouldn't start a conversation in English because I wouldn't know how to continue it."
Conversation

To participate in a conversation, conversational skills are needed. The only way to develop them is through interactive exercises where you take an active role and can practice speaking in English. We will provide you with these exercises set in real-life contexts and situations.
Confidence
Do you relate to the following: "I'm not confident enough to use English even in simple situations."
Confidence
You might not feel confident about your English right now, but after studying with us, you will no longer have any fear, as on your learning path we will ensure that:
Vocabulary
Do you think your lack of vocabulary makes it difficult for you to communicate in English?

options.description: No, my vocabulary is sufficiently broad

contents.text: Vocabulary
Master English will streamline your vocabulary learning with our state-of-the-art spaced repetition model. With this method, our app adapts to your learning speed.
Grammar
Is limited grammar knowledge something that makes it hard for you to express yourself?

options.description: I have some problems with this

contents.text: Grammar
For many, grammar is the heaviest part of learning a language. We want to lighten that load by using a pragmatic approach:

listItems.text: We will work on the skills that most hinder your ability to communicate in English.
As you improve, you will learn grammar in a contextualized way, in just the right amount, and without overwhelming you.

contents.text: Listen to others
Do you struggle to understand people when they speak at a normal pace in English?

options.description: Yes, for me it's too fast.
No, I understand what they say.

contents.text: Listen to others
Have you got the chance to practice your listening and reaction skills while listening to authentic real-life conversations?
Listen to others

In Master English, you will be exposed to native English models to get accustomed to their accents and speaking speeds.

Additionally, we will teach you to recognize those words and expressions that are more difficult for Spanish speakers to understand.
Pronunciation
Do you struggle with pronouncing English words?
Pronunciation
Have you received feedback on your pronunciation with detailed instructions to improve it?
Pronunciation

In the Master English app, we use speech recognition technology to detect your pronunciation mistakes and teach you how to correct them.

Additionally, you will be able to listen to yourself and compare your recordings with those of native speakers.
Express ideas
Do you feel that you can't find the right words when you want to explain something in English?

options.description: Yes, I have problems with this

contents.text: Express ideas
So you feel that you should know the words but they are just not on top of your mind fast enough?
Express ideas

Words are information, but the art of knowing how to use them is a skill. You can acquire this skill with interactive exercises where you take an active role. This way, you'll be able to use words and expressions fluently in different contexts.
Confidence
Do you relate to the following: "I'm not confident enough with my English to join a conversation."
Confidence
You might not feel confident about your English right now, but after studying with us, you will no longer have any fear, as on your learning path we will ensure that:
Vocabulary
Do you think your vocabulary is not sufficient to communicate in complex situations in English?

options.description: No, my vocabulary is already extensive

contents.text: Vocabulary
Master English will streamline your vocabulary learning with our state-of-the-art spaced repetition model. With this method, our app adapts to your learning speed.
Grammar
Do you feel that your grammar is not enough when you want to express yourself in complex situations in English?

options.description: I have some problems with this

contents.text: Grammar
For many, grammar is the heaviest part of learning a language. We want to lighten that load by using a pragmatic approach:

listItems.text: We will work on the skills that most hinder your ability to communicate in English.
As you improve, you will learn grammar in a contextualized way, in just the right amount, and without overwhelming you.

contents.text: Listen to others
Do you struggle to understand native English speakers when they speak at a normal pace?

options.description: No, I understand what they say.

contents.text: Listen to others
Have you got the chance to practice your listening and reaction skills while listening to authentic real-life conversations?
Listen to others

In Master English, you will be exposed to native English models to get accustomed to their accents and speaking speeds.

Additionally, we will teach you to recognize those words and expressions that are more difficult for Spanish speakers to understand.
Pronunciation
Do you feel insecure with your pronunciation?
Pronunciation
Have you received feedback on your pronunciation with detailed instructions to improve it?
Pronunciation

In the Master English app, we use speech recognition technology to detect your pronunciation mistakes and teach you how to correct them.

Additionally, you will be able to listen to yourself and compare your recordings with those of native speakers.
Express ideas
Do you sometimes struggle with finding the right words when you try to explain or write something in English?

options.description: Yes, I have problems with this

contents.text: Express ideas
So you feel that you should know the words but they are just not on top of your mind fast enough?
Express ideas

Words are information, but the art of knowing how to use them is a skill. You can acquire this skill with interactive exercises where you take an active role. This way, you'll be able to use words and expressions fluently in different contexts.
Expressions
Do you have trouble understanding the idioms or expressions people use when speaking English?
Expressions
Don't worry, once you understand where those expressions come from, it will be a lot easier for you to remember them.
Confidence
Do you relate to the following: "I'm not confident enough with my English to participate into any conversation without hesitation."
Confidence
You might not feel confident about your English right now, but after studying with us, you will no longer have any fear, as on your learning path we will ensure that:
Be natural
Do you have problems reacting to or responding naturally in English?
Be natural

Well, that's going to change! We will focus on internalizing your conversational skills so that you feel much more natural when participating in any conversation in English.

The more internalized your skills are, the less cognitive effort you will need to think about what to say.
Your English program
Master English offers a systematic approach to reach an advanced English comprehension in speaking, listening, writing, reading, and grammar.

contents.text: Mobile app

You will have an English program tailored to you and accessible from the Master English mobile app. All our exercises are highly interactive and have been designed by highly qualified English teachers. Additionally, we use native English speaker voice models in all our exercises. We will create your program based on your current level of English and will personalize it as we get to know your areas of difficulty and learning speed. We will help you to speak fluently and achieve an advanced level of English.
A personalized program

Although you will have independent learning, you will not be alone. Your program will always tell you what to do and provide you with constant feedback. For the first time, you will have access to a complete and fully personalized program from a mobile app. We will create review lessons based on your progress and use cutting-edge technology to detect your pronunciation errors and teach you how to correct them. Master English is very different from any other language app you have tried before.

items.text: While we prepare your program, we'll show you how it works...
We use personalized lessons to enhance your vocabulary.
We teach you how to express yourself naturally in English.
We help you apply grammar in a practical way.
You will engage in interactive and authentic conversations.
You will gain confidence to speak in English.
You will receive personalized feedback on your pronunciation.
We will show you your progress to keep you motivated.
You will develop skills that you can use in real life.
We will focus on those areas where you need to improve.
We will take you to an advanced level in English.

contents.text: You are in good hands
For the past 12 years, we have dedicated ourselves to researching how adults can improve their English in the most effective way possible. We know how to help you.

The program is 100% online in our mobile app. Once we finish personalizing it, you will receive access to your program. You will only need your mobile device (iPhone or Android) and an Internet connection.
Your previous experience

Master English uses interactive exercises to teach you conversational skills.

What kind of English learning experiences have you got before?

options.description: Mostly passive, listening to the teacher
I am used to doing interactive Speaking exercises.

contents.text: Focus
Do you relate to the following statement? "I have hoped that a professional would set me a study program that fits my needs and that I can trust."
Motivation

We believe that real-life focused conversation exercises with native speaker examples are key to making English learning practical and motivating.

But how motivated are you to improve your English?
Speed

Do you relate to the following statement?

"When I have been trying to learn English before, the progress has been so slow that I have lost my motivation."
Relevance

Do you relate to the following statement?

"To stay motivated, I need to learn content that I can apply in my day-to-day life."
Enthusiasm is key
When we feel that something is important and useful for us, it motivates us to learn it. On the other hand, we tend to forget what seems boring to us, and that makes learning difficult.
Reasons to improve

Do you relate to the following statement?

"External factors like better career opportunities serve as a motivator for me to improve my English."
Retain skills
Have you ever felt that when you put effort into it, you are able to improve your English skills but when time goes by you start to forget what you had learned?
This is the issue
It's easy to forget what you learned at basic or intermediate levels, but when you reach an advanced level, it's much more likely that the learning will be permanent.

listItems.text: The more you know English, the more opportunities you will have to use it in real life, such as at work. In other words, you will improve your English by being able to use it in your daily life.

contents.text: Personal schedule
Normally, how busy are you on an average day?

options.description: I'm busy but I try to make time for myself
I have time for new challenges

contents.text: Thank you for sharing
We understand. Let's try to find a schedule that is possible for you but still enough to deliver real results.
Thank you for sharing
We should be able to find a solution that doesn't take too much of your time but is still enough to deliver real results.
Excellent!
We can set a schedule that allows you to achieve results.
Study schedule

According to our research, English learning is most effective when you study from 2,5 to 4 hours per week and take at least 3 separate lessons.

Which of the following 3 schedules fits your needs the best?
Study schedule

According to our research, English learning is most effective when you study from 2,5 to 5 hours per week and take at least 3 separate lessons.

Which of the following 3 schedules fits your needs the best?
Study schedule

Great choice! Would you like to plan on which weekdays you usually complete your 5 weekly sessions?

As the program is completed independently in our app, you can naturally practice whenever you have time and change the schedule when needed. However, the best way to achieve results is to plan a clear schedule and stick to it.

options.description: Yes, I want to decide the days
I don't want to decide the days. I prefer to practice when I have time.

Great choice. Would you like to plan on which weekdays you usually complete your 3 weekly sessions? 

As the program is completed independently in our app, you can naturally practice whenever you have time and change the schedule when needed. However, the best way to achieve results is to plan a clear schedule and stick to it.

Study days

Practice when you can
No problem. You can practice with our app when you have time.

The advantage of using an app is that you can practice at any time of the day.

contents.text: Meta

#FIRSTNAME#, your program is almost ready. But before, did you know that having a set goal helps us stay focused and motivated? When we have a clear idea of why we are doing something, it's easier to keep going and not give up. So, let's set your goal!
Meta
My goal to achieve an advanced level in English is:

options.description: Get the job of my dreams
Travel to an English-speaking country and connect with the locals
I have my own goal in mind

contents.text: Award-winning method
In 2020, Master English won the EdTech Breakthrough Award for its exceptionally fast and efficient learning method.
What sets us apart?
Discover why Master English is different from other methods.

appRatingTexts.def: More than 14,900 reviews Our app has a rating of 4.9/5 on the App Store.
appRatingTexts.MX: More than 3,100 reviews Our app has a rating of 4.9/5 on the App Store.

contents.text: The key is personalization

testimonialOptions.name: Gretchen
testimonialOptions.text: I tried several English courses in the past and never managed to learn as much as with this one. It adapts to your schedule and helps you achieve your goals. I recommend it 100%.

contents.text: Now, we will ask you some questions about learning English to better understand your opinion and further personalize your program.
Who is faster?
Do you think adults can learn faster than children in school?
Correct!

With an optimized program, adults can learn faster than children.

We are able to embrace large quantities of information when we learn them in meaningful contexts and through clear explanations.

When our learning needs are taken into account, we can improve our English skills quickly.
Good news!

With an optimized program, adults can learn faster than children.

We are capable of storing large amounts of information when we learn them in meaningful contexts and through clear explanations.

When our learning needs are taken into account, we can improve our English skills quickly.
Let's reason your schedule

Your program includes #DAYS# weekly sessions of #MINUTES_PER_SESSION# minutes each.

But why don't we just reduce the practice to a single #TOTAL_WEEKLY_TIME# session per week?

options.description: No one can concentrate for that long.
It's difficult to find time for such a long session
It is not possible to review what has been learned at appropriate intervals

contents.text: Good try!

Correct answer: It wouldn't allow to repeat learnings within reasonable intervals. Of course, focusing for #TOTAL_WEEKLY_TIME# would be extremely hard. But that's not the most important reason. Why is the repetition interval so important? Because of how our memory works. Our memory needs to be stimulated several times within an optimal repetition window. Otherwise, it's easy to forget what we've learned.
Good try!

Correct answer: It wouldn't allow to repeat learnings within reasonable intervals. Of course, it's hard to schedule a #TOTAL_WEEKLY_TIME# -hour session. But that's not the most important reason. Why is the repetition interval so important? Because of how our memory works. Our memory needs to be stimulated several times within an optimal repetition window. Otherwise, it's easy to forget what we've learned.
You got it right!

It wouldn't allow to repeat learnings within reasonable intervals. And why is the repetition interval so important? Because of how our memory works. Our memory needs to be stimulated several times within an optimal repetition window. Otherwise, it's easy to forget what we've learned.
Thank you for your answers!
We know you are ready to start with your program! We are personalizing it to ensure that you will learn what you need.
One more thing

We saved the best part to the last. Here it comes:

At Master English, we are committed to helping Spanish speakers to achieve an advanced level in English. We think that if you don't reach an advanced level with our program, you should not pay.

We are willing to take the risk of getting results for you.

options.description: Interesting, I want to know more

contents.text: Results guarantee

We guarantee that if you complete your Master English online program of #MONTHS# months #PRACTICE_DAYS_PER_WEEK# sessions of #MINUTES_PER_SESSION# minutes per week you will achieve an advanced level in English. Otherwise, we will refund all your subscription fees in full.
Results guarantee
After completing your Master English program, you will have advanced skills in English. If not, you can get your money back in full.

To check if you have achieved an advanced level, you can take any of the following official English exams. If you do not achieve at least the results listed below, we will refund all your subscription fees in full.

listItems.text:
TOEFL iBT: 72 points
 TOEFL ITP: 585 points
listItems.title: TOEFL

listItems.text:
TOEIC Listening & Reading: 865 points
TOEIC Speaking & Writing: 335 points
listItems.title: TOEIC

contents.text:
To get the refund, take your English level test and send the result to us (soporte@masterenglish.com) within 2 months after having completed your Master English program.

A level test is only needed in case you want a refund.

paragraphs.label: How it works:
paragraphs.text: Once you start your subscription, you can immediately access your program in the app from your mobile device (iPhone or Android). Complete your program online independently in the Master English app.

guaranteeOptions.label: Guarantee:
guaranteeOptions.text: You will have an advanced level of English once you have completed your program by #END_DATE_LONG#. Otherwise, we will refund all your subscription fees in full (an official English exam is required, more information at #HANDLE#).

listItems.text: 1. Complete your program by #END_DATE_LONG#. 2. Take an English test and send us your results (soporte@masterenglish.com) within 2 months after you have completed your program. 3. If you do not achieve at least the results listed below, we will refund all your subscription fees in full:

TOEFL iBT: 72 points
 TOEFL ITP: 585 points
listItems.title: TOEFL

listItems.text:
TOEIC Listening & Reading: 865 points
TOEIC Speaking & Writing: 335 points
listItems.title: TOEIC

contents.text: You only need to take an English test if you want a refund.

paymentTexts.paymentHeader: Select a payment method to start your program
paymentTexts.title: Start a monthly subscription to begin your program
paymentTexts.typeOnetime:
The total amount for your #ME_MONTHS# month program is #ME_TOTAL_FEE#. The charge will be made on the same day of purchase.

Once you have completed your program, you will have an advanced level of English. If this is not achieved, we will refund the sum of #ME_TOTAL_FEE# (an English exam is required).
paymentTexts.typeSubscription:
The total amount for your #ME_MONTHS# month program is #ME_TOTAL_FEE#. This price will be charged to you in #ME_MONTHS# interest-free monthly installments of #ME_FEE# each. Today, the first charge will be made.

Once you have completed your program, you will have an advanced level of English. If this is not achieved, we will refund the sum of #ME_TOTAL_FEE# (an English test is required).

appRatingTexts.def: Our rating in the App Store is 4.9/5.
appRatingTexts.MX: Our rating in the App Store is 4.9/5.
